pageProduct.name: Sukin Kimmy Hogan Hand Cream 500ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Our Limited Edition Hand Cream Provides The Ultimate Natural Experience In Hand Care.  Moisturise The Hands, While Indulging In Our Enhanced Sukin Signature Scent Of Mandarin, Tangerine, Vanillin And Lavender.

Warnings

Avoid Contact With Eyes. If Irritation Occurs Rinse Immediately And Discontinue Use. We Recommend Patch Testing. For External Use Only.

Common Uses

Our Limited Edition, Non-Greasy Hand Cream Hydrates And Protects Dry Hands While Caring For Nails And Cuticles From Added Soy Protein. Aloe Vera, Vitamin E And Borage Oil Leaves Hands Feeling Nourished And Soft. Indulge In Our Enhanced Sukin Signature Scent Of Mandarin, Tangerine, Vanillin And Lavender.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Cetyl Alcohol, Ceteareth-20, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil (Rosehip), Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Oil, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Borago Officinalis Seed Oil (Borage), Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower Extract, Vanilla Planifolia Fruit Extract, Citrus Tangerina (Tangerine) Peel Oil, Citrus Nobilis (Mandarin Orange) Peel Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Vanillin, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Limonene*, Linalool*.   * Natural Component Of Essential Oils.

Directions

Apply As Often As Required On And Around The Hands, Nails And Cuticles.
